replies.body: Also just on the Quake Pro thing, it really depends on the individual. I used to use QP and then I turned it down a bit, and it MASSIVELY helped. But I still know people like Plaza and theo who can play well on QP. The target becomes smaller and some people can keep up with it. Personally I find it SUPER annoying with speed II, but it's personal preference I guess. :/

reply_to.body: Also just on the Quake Pro thing, it really depends on the individual. I used to use QP and then I turned it down a bit, and it MASSIVELY helped. But I still know people like Plaza and theo who can play well on QP. The target becomes smaller and some people can keep up with it. Personally I find it SUPER annoying with speed II, but it's personal preference I guess. :/
